sense.def:
Satisfaction
je prijeten občutek, ki ga imamo, ko naredimo nekaj, kar smo želeli ali morali narediti.

seg.quote: She read what she had written with satisfaction.
...a sigh which expressed her satisfaction at being there.

sense.def:
To get satisfaction from someone
pomeni, da od nekoga dobimo denar ali opravičilo, ker nas je s svojim dejanjem prizadel ali nam storil krivico.

seg.quote: Consumers who have been unable to get satisfaction from their local branch should write direct to the Chairman.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
done to one's satisfaction
, je narejeno tako, da je človek s tem zadovoljen.

seg.quote: Every detail was worked out to everyone's satisfaction.
